articles.title: Honkai: Star Rail version 4.0 update ‘No Aha At Full Moon’ launches February 13 - Gematsu
articles.description: The version 4.0 update for Honkai: Star Rail, dubbed “No Aha At Full Moon,” will launch on February 13, developer miHoYo announced.
articles.content:
The version 4.0 update for Honkai: Star Rail, dubbed “No Aha At Full Moon,” will launch on February 13, developer miHoYo announced.
